ca.ualberta.CMPUT301F13T02.chooseyouradventure

Class EditStoryActivity

  • java.lang.Object
    • Activity
      • ca.ualberta.CMPUT301F13T02.chooseyouradventure.EditStoryActivity

  • public class EditStoryActivity
extends Activity
    This Activity allows a story's author to edit a story by adding adding pages, deleting pages, setting the first page, or deleting or renaming the story. This class is part of the view of the application.
    Author:
    James Cadek, James Moore
